pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modified Poisson Regression of Grouped and Right-Censored Counts // Implement maximum likelihood estimation for Poisson generalized linear models with grouped and right-censored count data. Intended to be used for analyzing grouped and right- censored data, which is widely applied in many branches of social sciences. The algorithm implemented is described in Fu et al., (2021) doi:10.1111/rssa.12678.
